body: Erik discusses local web cache lessons from Uganda: "Orange Uganda has seen local traffic jump from 3Mbs to over 30Mbs in just two weeks due to partnering and implementing Google’s Global Cache. One wonders how much business they’re starting to chip away at from their competition."
original_body: Erik discusses local web cache lessons from Uganda: "Orange Uganda has seen local traffic jump from 3Mbs to over 30Mbs in just two weeks due to partnering and implementing Google’s Global Cache. One wonders how much business they’re starting to chip away at from their competition."
title: Uganda: Local web cache lessons
